actor_awards.notes: Top box-office draw in the late 1940s; dubbed 'The Sultan's Favorite' by the Sultan of Morocco.

filmography.title: The Princess and the Pirate
filmography.role_description: A runaway princess traveling incognito who gets caught between a bumbling actor (Bob Hope) and a ruthless pirate.
filmography.plot: A cowardly actor on the run disguises himself as a pirate and tries to save a princess from the notorious Captain Hook.

filmography.title: Wonder Man
filmography.role_description: A librarian who becomes the love interest of a quiet bookworm forced to impersonate his murdered twin brother.
filmography.plot: A bookworm must impersonate his murdered twin brother to help bring the killers to justice, guided by the brother's ghost.

filmography.title: The Kid from Brooklyn
filmography.role_description: A nightclub singer and girlfriend of a timid milkman turned prizefighter in this musical comedy.
filmography.plot: A milkman becomes a boxing sensation through a series of fixed fights, believing he is a true contender.

filmography.title: The Best Years of Our Lives
filmography.role_description: The shallow, unfaithful wife of a returning WWII hero, interested only in the good times and his money.
filmography.plot: Three WWII veterans return home to small-town America to discover that they and their families have changed.

filmography.title: The Secret Life of Walter Mitty
filmography.role_description: The mysterious dream girl of a daydreaming proofreader who turns out to be real and involved in a dangerous plot.
filmography.plot: A clumsy dreamer gets caught up in a real-life conspiracy involving crown jewels while retreating into his fantasy world.

filmography.title: Out of the Blue
filmography.role_description: A beautiful woman involved in a darkly comic misunderstanding when she is believed to be dead.
filmography.plot: A henpecked husband believes he has accidentally killed a young woman and tries to hide the body, which keeps disappearing.

filmography.title: A Song Is Born
filmography.role_description: A gangster's moll and singer who hides out with a group of music professors, teaching them about jazz.
filmography.plot: A group of music professors researching the history of music get involved with a nightclub singer on the run from the mob.

filmography.title: Smart Girls Don't Talk
filmography.role_description: A society woman who gets mixed up with a gangster and his illegal gambling club.
filmography.plot: A socialite becomes involved with a racketeer who opens a gambling club, drawing her into the underworld.

filmography.title: Flaxy Martin
filmography.role_description: A ruthless, manipulative femme fatale who sets up a lawyer to take the fall for a murder.
filmography.plot: A mob lawyer is framed for murder by the beautiful but deadly woman he loves.

filmography.title: Colorado Territory
filmography.role_description: A loyal, half-breed woman who aids an escaped outlaw and stays with him until their tragic end.
filmography.plot: An outlaw breaks out of jail to pull one last train robbery, but is betrayed by his partners and hunted by the law.

filmography.title: The Girl from Jones Beach
filmography.role_description: A shapely schoolteacher who is discovered by an artist looking for the perfect model.
filmography.plot: An artist discovers that a schoolteacher embodies the 'perfect' composite features of 12 different models.

filmography.title: White Heat
filmography.role_description: The treacherous, gum-chewing wife of a psychotic gangster, who cheats on him while he is in prison.
filmography.plot: A psychopathic criminal with a mother complex makes a daring escape from prison and leads his old gang in a chemical plant payroll heist.

filmography.title: Red Light
filmography.role_description: A showgirl who helps an innocent man find the Gideon Bible that contains the clue to exonerate him.
filmography.plot: A man searches for the Gideon Bible that contains the only clue to the identity of his brother's murderer.

filmography.title: Always Leave Them Laughing
filmography.role_description: The wife of a fading comedian who becomes the object of affection for a younger, ambitious comic.
filmography.plot: A young comedian rises to the top by stealing material and stepping on toes, including those of his mentor.

filmography.title: Backfire
filmography.role_description: A nurse who helps a war veteran solve the mystery of his missing friend.
filmography.plot: A veteran searches for his missing friend, who is suspected of murder, with the help of a hospital nurse.

filmography.title: The Flame and the Arrow
filmography.role_description: An aristocratic hostage who falls in love with the rebel leader holding her captive in medieval Italy.
filmography.plot: In medieval Lombardy, a playfully roguish archer takes on the Holy Roman Empire to free his people and reclaim his son.

filmography.title: The West Point Story
filmography.role_description: A talented singer and assistant to a Broadway director who helps put on a show at the military academy.
filmography.plot: A Broadway director goes to West Point to stage a show and ends up enrolling as a cadet.

filmography.title: Along the Great Divide
filmography.role_description: The daughter of a man accused of murder, who clashes with the marshal escorting him to trial.
filmography.plot: A U.S. Marshal tries to get a suspect to trial while battling a lynch mob and the desert elements.

filmography.title: Captain Horatio Hornblower
filmography.role_description: The sister of the Duke of Wellington who falls in love with the heroic naval captain while nursing him back to health.
filmography.plot: During the Napoleonic wars, a British naval captain has adventures in Central American waters.

filmography.title: Painting the Clouds with Sunshine
filmography.role_description: One of three showgirls who head to Las Vegas to find rich husbands, only to find true love instead.
filmography.plot: Three singing sisters go to Las Vegas to find millionaire husbands but find complications instead.

filmography.title: She's Working Her Way Through College
filmography.role_description: A burlesque dancer who enrolls in college to become a writer, sparking controversy on campus.
filmography.plot: A burlesque star decides to leave the stage and get a college education, causing a stir among the faculty and students.

filmography.title: The Iron Mistress
filmography.role_description: A haughty Creole belle in New Orleans who rejects Jim Bowie, driving him to reckless adventures.
filmography.plot: A fictionalized account of the life of Jim Bowie, focusing on his romances and the creation of the Bowie knife.

filmography.title: South Sea Woman
filmography.role_description: A showgirl stranded in the Pacific during WWII who gets involved with two Marines awaiting court-martial.
filmography.plot: A Marine is on trial for desertion and theft, but his testimony reveals a wild adventure involving a showgirl and the Japanese navy.

filmography.title: The Silver Chalice
filmography.role_description: A glamorous assistant to a magician who vies for the love of the artisan designing the Holy Grail's cup.
filmography.plot: A Greek artisan is commissioned to cast the cup of Christ in silver and hide it, but he is tempted by a magician and a dancer.

filmography.title: The Big Land
filmography.role_description: The sister of an alcoholic architect who falls for a cattleman trying to build a town.
filmography.plot: A group of cattlemen and farmers band together to build a town and a railroad spur to ship their goods.

filmography.title: The Story of Mankind
filmography.role_description: Mayo portrays the Egyptian queen in a segment of this star-studded fantasy drama.
filmography.plot: The Spirit of Man and the Devil argue over whether humanity is worth saving, using examples from history.
